text:
I found that the computeCheckPeriod()couldn't return correct values for 
datePattern of 
"'.'yyyy-MM", "'.'yyyy-ww" and "'.'yyyy-MM-dd". It returns 2 wrongly instead of 
5, 4, and 3 respectively. This value (2) means rolling over once half a day. 
This means we need to fathom out the cause why it doesn't work for these cases.
creator: hshi@pelagonet.com

text:
Hui,

I am surprised to hear about this. The computeCheckPeriod is extremely well 
tested. May I ask you to double check your bug report? Thank you, Ceki
creator: cgu@qos.ch
